description: Frieren and Fern decide to test the spell on fish that Stark has caught while he gathers firewood. The fish speak pitifully and bemoan their family`s bad luck, as their father was caught the day before. They wonder if they will be roasted or simmered. Frieren and Fern lose the appetite for fish and ask Stark to release them to his shock.

titles.title: OO Magic Episode 8: The Magic to Understand a Fish`s Feelings
OO no Mahou Dai 8 Kai: Sakana no Kimochi ga Wakaru Mahou
●●の魔法 第8回: 魚の気持ちがわかる魔法
